message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. It's a steal for the value it provides!  Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $850000. What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. I can come down a bit, but I'm still firm on selling for at least $1000000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1050000?
Alice, I'm still very interested in the product, but $1050000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to go to $900000.  This is my final offer, so let me know if you're willing to work with me.
Bob, I understand your position, and I'm trying to be flexible here.  I can't go lower than $950000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not quite there.  I'm happy to go to $925000.  This is a good compromise for us both.  What do you think?
